name: Mystery Solitaire. The Black Raven 5
description:
These are dark and mysterious times. 200 not easy levels in the game "Mystery Solitaire. The Black Raven 5" is waiting for your mind.

Collect the cards one by one in order to collect each solitaire. The game has 200 levels, divided into 20 locations. For a good game you will get special trophies. A large number of levels will allow you to enjoy the game for hours every day! The unique balance of the game and the complexity of the levels will allow you to strain your mind. This is a real challenge for the solitaire lover!

- 200 levels in 20 locations
- Solitaire card game - assemble a chain of cards!
- Use the joker when you're stuck.
- Multiplier combo, will give you more coins!
- 15 mystical rewards!
- Original themed decks and 12 card shirt styles!
